tool_description: Get Robbery Sample Data and Use the format in your project
name: RobberyData
title: RobberyData

api_list.name: Get Individual Result by ID
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://robberydata.p.rapidapi.com/data/10"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "robberydata.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://robberydata.p.rapidapi.com/data/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "robberydata.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
